update.description:
The code generates different jobs for the ignition collections, currently only acropolis.

* 3 testing jobs for Windows \(new PR for implementation needed\), Mac and Linu

    * Mac \(failing we need an alias for ignition-acropolis1\)
    
        ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_acropolis-ci-default-homebrew-amd64&build=4)
    
        [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_acropolis-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/4/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_acropolis-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/4/)

    
    * Linux 
    
        ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_acropolis-install-pkg-bionic-amd64&build=18)
    
        [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_acropolis-install-pkg-bionic-amd64/18/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_acropolis-install-pkg-bionic-amd64/18/)

    
    
* The debbuild job we have used in the release
* The creation of the Jenkins View to display the dashboard of failing jobs. I’ve used the name [DSLign-acropolis](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/DSLign-acropolis) to be able to compare it with the current \(and final name, I’ll change it\) [ ign-acropolis](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/ign-acropolis)

The job list should be improved not have it hardcoded.
update.title: DSL code to generate ignition collections views/jobs
